Fig. 15 shows expected loss reductions, risk premiums, and uncertainty premiums for a 1 m dike rise mitigation policy for current and future conditions in Osaka Bay, Japan. Values vary spatially. The color scale goes up to >10 million yen. Future conditions show increased expected loss reductions compared to current. No specific number given, so assigned 0.
